pages-app-home-paragraph: Part-up gets you your best team for the job. Just share your dream or talent and weâ€™ll help you find the right team! You are free to choose what you work on and who you work with. Together you decide on the activities and what each will contribute. You build your profile and show the world what you're good at!
pages-app-home-loggedin-paragraph: You are an upper now and ready to get your team started! Are you in need of a team to realize your goal or dream? Just start your own part-up. Do you want to put your talent to work and contribute to an existing team? Find your best matching part-ups on the discover page.
pages-app-home-calltoaction-loggedin-tit: Ready to start crowdorganizing? Get your Part-up tribe!
pages-app-home-calltoaction-loggedin-des: You have an organization or community with the right people. They work together best if they have the freedom to self-organize. We help them to start their best teams ever.
pages-app-home-calltoaction-loggedout-ti: Need a team? Start your own part-up for free!
pages-app-home-calltoaction-loggedout-de: Share your dream, project, or talent and instantly pick your team mates. We introduce you to the right people. Together you decide on each ones contributions.
pages-app-home-featurednetworks-descript: A flexible and highly motivated workforce. That's what Part-up brings to your organization or community. It is a giant leap into the future of work for commercial, non-profit, volunteer, and professional service organizations. And also for freelance networks, care cooperatitves and community service initiatives. Be inspired by our launching partners to start your own tribe
